name: IMDbetter
description: Features: - Sticky Navigation Bar (+ narrower new home/film pages) - Thin Scrollbars (for both Firefox and Chrome) - Dark Scrollbars for dark sections (such as the home page or add-to-list dropdown menu) - Dark Search Form (since the navbar is dark) - Dark Theme (may not look perfect on help/contribution/pro pages) Full configurable version available at GreasyFork
